com.philips.lighting.model

Class PHLightState

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.philips.lighting.model.PHLightState

  • public class PHLightState
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides settings of a light, that can be applied to a light, group of lights.

    • Constructor Summary

      Instantiates a new PHLightState with given values of another PHLightState object

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj)
        Compares this object to the specified object. The result is true if and only if the argument is not null and is a PHLightState object that represent same light state details as this object.
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
        Parameters:
        obj - the object to compare this PHLightState against.
        Returns:
        true if the given object represents a PHLightState equivalent to this PHLightState, false otherwise.
